name: NutritionRecommendationGrouping
title: Nutrition Recommendation Grouping
description: (Clinical Focus: This set contains nutrition interventions included in the areas of nutrition intervention that are based upon nutrition assessment and resulting nutrition diagnosis.),(Data Element Scope: Data elements are those in food and nutrient delivery, nutrition education and counseling, coordination of care by a nutrition professional.),(Inclusion Criteria: All interventions used for nutrition care are included.),(Exclusion Criteria: Nutrition assessment and diagnosis concepts.)
